Our first ever online video course is out now on SKILLSHARE!

Are you looking for your next big break? Whether you’ve NEVER had a big break in your creative career OR you’re a veteran creative who needs a new big break to reinvent yourself: this class is for you!!! Go to https://www.skillshare.com/r/profile/Andy-J.-Pizza/2832678 to get started!!!

itunes:title: 273 - Personal Brand and Positioning Yourself in the Market with Meg Lewis
itunes:author: Ryan Appleton, Andy J. Pizza, Meg Lewis
itunes:summary:
Are you carefully and clearly communicating what opportunities you’re perfect for?

So much of what comes your way is due to how you’re positioning yourself in the market. You can change a lot by being intentional with what you’re projecting  in your personal brand.

In this episode I chat with Co-Loop artist Meg Lewis about how she learned this the hard way and how course correcting made all the difference.

We also talk about
- Personal Brand
- Collaboration as the Cure to Jealousy
- Owning Your Strengths
